name: Gary Marin
description:
On Saturday, police identified the five employees killed when a gunman opened fire at Henry Pratt, a manufacturing company in Aurora, Illinois.

The gunman, who was identified as 45-year-old Gary Martin, was fatally shot by police. Five officers were wounded but are said to be in non-life-threatening condition.


For more info, please go to http://www.globalnews.ca
